p: The total flavonoid contents were determined based on an aluminium chloride colorimetric method as described previously [ 16]. The reaction mixture consisted of extract solution (0.5 mL), NaNO 2 (5% w/ v, 0.15 mL), AlCl 3 (10% w/ v, 0.15 mL), and NaOH (1 M, 2 mL). After incubating for 15 mins, the absorbance was taken at 510 nm. Rutin (6.40–1000 μg/mL) was used to generate a standard curve. Results were expressed as mg rutin equivalent (mgRE)/gram dried material.
